document_data.mainbody:
Drongo Bixworth, husband of Florean Bixworth, was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Drongo was a young human man with a dark brown skin tone, black eyes, and black hair.
In the , Drongo Bixworth and his husband, Florean, found themselves unjustly detained by Fist Elthira Gossen during what was meant to be a promenade through the Lower City of the Gate. The couple, taking a rest due to Floreans lame leg, appeared suspicious to the overzealous Fist patrolwoman. Despite their innocence and only wanting to return home, Florean and Drongo were subjected to unwarranted accusations and harassment for simply loitering.
